source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT MovieIdNK
      ,Title
      ,ReleaseDate
      ,Runtime
      ,s.MovieStatusName as MovieStatusName
      ,m.CreatedDate
      ,ModifiedDate
  FROM tMovies m
  join tMovieStatus s on m.MovieStatusId = s.MovieStatusId

activities.name: Data flow for fact tables population

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT year(TransactionDate)*10000+month(TransactionDate)*100+day(TransactionDate) as DateKey
      ,se.ServiceKey
      ,m.MovieKey
      ,Price
      ,TransactionId
  FROM tOnlinePurchase p 
  join tOnlineService s on p.ServiceId = s.ServiceId
  join tMovies mov on p.MovieId = mov.MovieId
  join DimMovieExternal m on m.MovieIdNK = mov.MovieIdNK
  join DimOnlineServiceExternal se on se.ServiceCode = s.ServiceCode

select  year(TransactionDate)*100+month(TransactionDate) as month_key,
			ServiceKey,
			sum(Price) as PurchiseAmount,
			count(*) as PurchaseQuantity
from tOnlinePurchase p
join tOnlineService s on p.ServiceId = s.ServiceId
join DimOnlineServiceExternal se on se.ServiceCode = s.ServiceCode
group by year(TransactionDate)*100+month(TransactionDate), ServiceKey

scriptLines: split1@oldMovies derive(MoviesDBHash = sha2(256,concat(toString(split1@oldMovies@MovieIdNK), split1@oldMovies@Title, toString(split1@oldMovies@ReleaseDate), toString(split1@oldMovies@Runtime)))) ~> GetMoviesDBHash
DataMartDimMovieForHash derive(DataMartHash = sha2(256,concat(toString(MovieIdNK), Title, toString(ReleaseDate), toString(Runtime)))) ~> GetDataMartHash
